sourcesContent:
import React ,{Component} from 'react'; import { Grid, Paper } from '@material-ui/core'; import * as historyService from "../../Axios-Actions/historyService"; import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import CardActions from '@material-ui/core/CardActions'; import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; var i=0; class orderHistory extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { task:[], }; } componentDidMount(){ historyService.getAllOrders() .then((result) => { this.setState({ task: result.data }); }) } render() { const { task } = this.state; return (
    { task.map(t=>(
  • Order:{i+1}
  • Title: {t.title}
    •
  • Start Time: {t.starttime}
    •
  • End Time: {t.endtime}
    •
  • Month: {t.month}
    •
  • Service Type: {t.servicetype}
    •
  • Location: {t.location}
    •
  • Bill: {(t.month*t.permonth)+(t.pertask)+(t.perhour*(parseInt(t.endtime)-parseInt(t.starttime))*(t.month*30))}
    •
  • Service Provider Email: {t.serviceprovideremail}
    •  )) }

Order History

    { task.map(t=>(
  • Title Starting Time End time Month Service type Location Total Bill Serviceprovider Email
    {t.title} {t.starttime} {t.endtime} {t.month} {t.servicetype} {t.location} {(t.month*t.permonth)+(t.pertask)+(t.perhour*(parseInt(t.endtime)-parseInt(t.starttime))*(t.month*30))} {t.serviceprovideremail}
    • )) }
); } } export default orderHistory ;
